Dataset: webnlg

Here is the data, now generate text using the provided data:

Output:
final_response: Abraham A. Ribicoff was born in the United States and was an American by nationality. He was a member of the Democratic Party and served in office during the presidency of John F. Kennedy. His spouse was Ruth Ribicoff.
